text: Yenepoya University is a private deemed university located in Deralakatte, Mangaluru, Karnataka, India. It was started in 2008 to bring together several existing colleges, the oldest being Yenepoya Dental College, which was established in 1992. The university has different colleges offering courses in medicine, dentistry, allied health sciences, physiotherapy, pharmacy, nursing, Ayurveda, homeopathy, naturopathy, engineering, as well as arts, science, commerce, and management. Yenepoya (Deemed to be University) is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC), New Delhi under section 3(A) of the UGC Act, 1956, and has been awarded an "A+" grade by NAAC. The university has around 13,000 students. Mr. Farhaad Yenepoya is the Pro-Chancellor of the Yenepoya Group of Institutions. == References ==
title: Yenepoya University
